security: Revealing IDEN A's role as a cover company president and funding source, his access to oil companies for operational vessel back-stopping, and his contact with specific individuals (MANGROLL, HOWGRIND, SACHTSCHALE, COSTELLO) and operational elements (YOCOUGH, YOAFT, M/V BARB) would compromise JMWAVE operations.  Quoting directly: "IDEN A was first enlisted as the President of YOCOUGH, a JMWAVE cover company...IDEN A also permits use of his own company as a funding mechanism for YOCOUGH. He has also made available several oil companies..."
summary: A dispatch from the Chief of Station, JMWAVE, detailing the activities of IDEN A, a wealthy New Orleans businessman used in JMWAVE cover operations, requesting a 201 file number be assigned to him.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret dispatch from the Chief of Station, JMWAVE, dated May 19, 1965, reports on IDEN A, identified as Alfred J. *Moran, a wealthy New Orleans businessman who serves as the president of YOCOUGH, a JMWAVE cover company. IDEN A also provides funding through his own company and makes oil companies in which he owns interests available to back-stop cover for JMWAVE operational vessels. The dispatch notes IDEN A's contacts with individuals like Rufus E. MANGROLL, Colin R. HOWGRIND, and Eli A. SACHTSCHALE, and it requests that a 201 file number be assigned to IDEN A.
title: Contact Report - IDEN A
